${msg('stats.headline')}

<#if !config.useMaidenName>

${msg('list.lastNamesInfo')}

${msg('stats.numberOfPeople',st.people?string,st.livePeople?string)}
${msg('stats.numberOfMen',st.men?string,st.liveMen?string)}
${msg('stats.numberOfWomen',st.women?string,st.liveWomen?string)}
${msg('stats.numberOfGeneration',st.generation?string)}

${msg('stats.men')}:

<#assign text=msg('stats.maxAgeOfDead')/> <#assign date=st.maxDeadManAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfDead')}"/> <#assign date=st.minDeadManAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxLiveManAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.minLiveManAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageManAge!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageMarriageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageManAgeOnWedding!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageFirstChildAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageManAgeOnFirstChild!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign names><#list st.frequentManNames.theMost as name>${name}<#if name_has_next>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentName',names,st.frequentManNames.theMostCount)}

${msg('stats.women')}:

<#assign text="${msg('stats.maxAgeOfDead')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxDeadWomanAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfDead')}"/> <#assign date=st.minDeadWomanAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxLiveWomanAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.minLiveWomanAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageWomanAge!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageMarriageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageWomanAgeOnWedding!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageFirstChildAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageWomanAgeOnFirstChild!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign names><#list st.frequentWomanNames.theMost as name>${name}<#if name_has_next>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentName',names,st.frequentWomanNames.theMostCount)}

${msg('stats.all')}:

<#assign text="${msg('stats.maxAgeOfDead')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxDeadAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfDead')}"/> <#assign date=st.minDeadAge!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxLiveAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minAgeOfAlive')}"/> <#assign date=st.minLiveAge!""/> <#assign span=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign span=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageAge!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageMarriageAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageAgeOnWedding!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.averageFirstChildAge')}"/> <#assign date=st.averageAgeOnFirstChild!""/> <#assign notPerson=true/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign notPerson=false/> <#if (st.frequentWomanNames.theMostCount>st.frequentManNames.theMostCount)> <#assign names><#list st.frequentWomanNames.theMost as name>${name}<#if name_has_next>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentName',names,st.frequentWomanNames.theMostCount)} <#else> <#assign names><#list st.frequentManNames.theMost as name>${name}<#if name_has_next>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentName',names,st.frequentManNames.theMostCount)}

${msg('stats.birthDayMonth')}:

<#assign names><#list st.frequentBirthMonth.theMost as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentBirthMonth.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentBirthMonth',names,st.frequentBirthMonth.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentBirthDay.theMost as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentBirthDay.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentBirthDay',names,st.frequentBirthDay.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentBirthMonth.theLeast as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentBirthMonth.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentBirthMonth',names,st.frequentBirthMonth.theLeastCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentBirthDay.theLeast as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentBirthDay.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentBirthDay',names,st.frequentBirthDay.theLeastCount)}

${msg('stats.deathDayMonth')}:

<#assign names><#list st.frequentDeathMonth.theMost as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentDeathMonth.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentDeathMonth',names,st.frequentDeathMonth.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentDeathDay.theMost as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentDeathDay.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentDeathDay',names,st.frequentDeathDay.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentDeathMonth.theLeast as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentDeathMonth.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentDeathMonth',names,st.frequentDeathMonth.theLeastCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentDeathDay.theLeast as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentDeathDay.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentDeathDay',names,st.frequentDeathDay.theLeastCount)}

${msg('stats.weddingDayMonth')}:

<#assign names><#list st.frequentWeddingMonth.theMost as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentWeddingMonth.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentWeddingMonth',names,st.frequentWeddingMonth.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentWeddingDay.theMost as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentWeddingDay.theMost?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.mostFrequentWeddingDay',names,st.frequentWeddingDay.theMostCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentWeddingMonth.theLeast as monthNumber>${msg('stats.frequentMonth.month',monthNumber)}<#if monthNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentWeddingMonth.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentWeddingMonth',names,st.frequentWeddingMonth.theLeastCount)}
<#assign names><#list st.frequentWeddingDay.theLeast as dayNumber>${msg('stats.frequentDay.day',dayNumber)}<#if dayNumber_has_next><#if (st.frequentWeddingDay.theLeast?size==2)> a <#else>, ${msg('stats.leastFrequentWeddingDay',names,st.frequentWeddingDay.theLeastCount)}

${msg('stats.weddingData')}:

<#assign text="${msg('stats.minWomanAgeOnWedding')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.wedding')}"/> <#assign date=st.minWomanAgeOnWedding!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minManAgeOnWedding')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.wedding')}"/> <#assign date=st.minManAgeOnWedding!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxWomanAgeOnWedding')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.wedding')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxWomanAgeOnWedding!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxManAgeOnWedding')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.wedding')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxManAgeOnWedding!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/>
<#assign date=st.minMarriageLength!""/> <#if date!="" && (date.id>-1)> <#assign p=utils.partnershipForId(date.id)/> ${msg('stats.minManMarriageLenght')}: <#assign inc_name_persone=p.man/> <#include "parts/name.htm"/> & <#assign inc_name_persone=p.woman/> <#include "parts/name.htm"/> - (${msg('stats.partnershipDetail')}) - <#if date.years??><#if date.months??>${msg('stats.years',date.years)}<#else>${msg('stats.yearsPlusMinus',date.years)}<#if date.months??><#if date.days??> ${msg('stats.months',date.months)}<#else> ${msg('stats.monthsPlusMinus',date.months)}<#if date.days??> ${msg('stats.days',date.days)} (${msg('stats.onlyDays',date.onlyDays)})
<#assign date=st.maxMarriageLength!""/> <#if date!="" && (date.id>-1)> <#assign p=utils.partnershipForId(date.id)/> ${msg('stats.maxManMarriageLenght')}: <#assign inc_name_persone=p.man/> <#include "parts/name.htm"/> & <#assign inc_name_persone=p.woman/> <#include "parts/name.htm"/> - (${msg('stats.partnershipDetail')}) - <#if date.years??><#if date.months??>${msg('stats.years',date.years)}<#else>${msg('stats.yearsPlusMinus',date.years)}<#if date.months??><#if date.days??> ${msg('stats.months',date.months)}<#else> ${msg('stats.monthsPlusMinus',date.months)}<#if date.days??> ${msg('stats.days',date.days)} (${msg('stats.onlyDays',date.onlyDays)})

${msg('stats.parentsData')}:

<#assign text="${msg('stats.minWomanAgeOnChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.child')}"/> <#assign date=st.minWomanAgeOnChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minManAgeOnChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.child')}"/> <#assign date=st.minManAgeOnChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxWomanAgeOnChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.child')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxWomanAgeOnChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxManAgeOnChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.child')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxManAgeOnChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxWomanAgeOnFirstChild')}"/> <#assign event=""/> <#assign date=st.maxWomanAgeOnFirstChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxManAgeOnFirstChild')}"/> <#assign event=""/> <#assign date=st.maxManAgeOnFirstChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign names> <#list st.maxCountChildrenPeople as person> <#assign inc_name_persone=person/> <#include "parts/name.htm"/> <#if person_has_next>, ${msg('stats.maxChildrenCount',st.maxCountChildren,st.maxCountChildrenPeople?size,names)}

${msg('stats.grandParentsData')}:

<#assign text="${msg('stats.minWomanAgeOnGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.grandChild')}"/> <#assign date=st.minWomanAgeOnGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.minManAgeOnGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.grandChild')}"/> <#assign date=st.minManAgeOnGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxWomanAgeOnGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.grandChild')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxWomanAgeOnGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxManAgeOnGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event="${msg('stats.event.grandChild')}"/> <#assign date=st.maxManAgeOnGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxWomanAgeOnFirstGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event=""/> <#assign date=st.maxWomanAgeOnFirstGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/> <#assign text="${msg('stats.maxManAgeOnFirstGrandChild')}"/> <#assign event=""/> <#assign date=st.maxManAgeOnFirstGrandChild!""/> <#include "parts/statsAge.htm"/>

* ${msg('stats.notice')}
